# LM358 Dual Operational Amplifier

## General Description

The LM358 series consists of two independent, high-gain, internally frequency-compensated operational amplifiers designed specifically to operate from a single power supply.

## Absolute Maximum Ratings

| Parameter | Value | Unit |
|-----------|-------|------|
| Supply Voltage | 32 or ±16 | V |
| Differential Input Voltage | 32 | V |
| Input Voltage | -0.3 to 32 | V |
| Output Short Circuit Duration | Continuous | - |
| Operating Temperature Range | 0 to 70 | °C |
| Storage Temperature Range | -65 to 150 | °C |

## Electrical Characteristics (VCC = 5V, TA = 25°C)

| Parameter | Condition | Min | Typ | Max | Unit |
|-----------|-----------|-----|-----|-----|------|
| Input Offset Voltage | - | - | 2 | 7 | mV |
| Input Bias Current | - | - | 45 | 250 | nA |
| Input Offset Current | - | - | 5 | 50 | nA |
| Large Signal Voltage Gain | RL ≥ 2kΩ, VOUT = 1V to 4V | 25 | 100 | - | V/mV |
| Common Mode Rejection Ratio | - | 65 | 85 | - | dB |

## Pin Description

| Pin | Symbol | Description |
|-----|--------|-------------|
| 1 | 1OUT | Output 1 |
| 2 | 1IN- | Inverting Input 1 |
| 3 | 1IN+ | Non-inverting Input 1 |
| 4 | GND | Ground |
| 5 | 2IN+ | Non-inverting Input 2 |
| 6 | 2IN- | Inverting Input 2 |
| 7 | 2OUT | Output 2 |
| 8 | VCC | Positive Supply Voltage |

## Typical Applications

### Unity-Gain Buffer

```
VIN ---[1IN+]---
              |
        [1IN-]---+--- [1OUT]--- VOUT
              |
             GND
```

### Non-Inverting Amplifier

```
         R2
         |
    +----+----[1OUT]--- VOUT
    |
VIN-[1IN+]
    |
    [1IN-]---R1--- GND
```

## Features

- Single supply operation: 3V to 32V
- Dual supply operation: ±1.5V to ±16V
- Low input offset voltage: 2 mV typ
- Low input bias current: 45 nA typ
- Internally compensated
- Unity gain stable
- Available in 8-pin DIP and SOIC packages

## Package Information

| Package Type | Pins | Package Size |
|--------------|------|--------------|
| PDIP | 8 | 9.8 x 6.4 mm |
| SOIC | 8 | 4.9 x 3.9 mm |
| TSSOP | 8 | 3.0 x 3.0 mm |
